body.name: COOFANDY Men's Casual Button Down Short Sleeve Shirts Textured Summer Beach Shirt
features: Care instructions Machine Wash, Hand Wash Only
【TEXTURE FABRIC】Mens casual short sleeve shirt is made of soft, lightweight, breathable and absorption fabric, keeping you cool and relaxed in summer.
【STYLISH DESIGN】Designed with regular fit, short sleeve with cufflinks, button closure and slight horizontal ribbing, this men summer beach shirts make you look casual and handsome.

【CASUAL LOOKING】 men casual button up shirts could be paired with linen pants, shorts and jeans to create daily and casual style, or matched with vest, t-shirt, sunglasses and other accessories to create personalized stylish style.
【OCCASIONS】Suitable for spring and summer. This mens beach shirt is a great choice for beach, vacation, cruises, wedding, lounging, party, date, street, or daily casual wear.
【Warm Tips】Wash in cold water. Machine and hand wash are both available. Hang to dry. Please check the size chart before purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, even after being packed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Shirt For Casual Occasions
reviews.reviewText: The COOFANDY Men's Casual Button Down Shirt in Army Green is a casual shirt that can easily be paired with shorts, jeans, or pants. The materials used on the shirt makes it soft, stretchable, and breathable that makes it the perfect shirt for all day comfort. The texture of the shirt reminds me of a linen-type texture with a subtle ripple design. The material feels thin, however, it doesn't feel cheaply made. There is an epaulet strap on the bottom of both sleeves but does not serve any purpose and is there just for the shirt's design. I have washed this shirt before wearing the first time in cold water in a garment bag with a laundry detergent used for delicate items. The color of the shirt bled a little but luckily it didn't stain any of my other shirts in the washer. So keep that in mind when washing this shirt for the first time. This shirt isn't advertised as wrinkle-free but it didn't wrinkle that much when it dried. I simply used my garment steamer and the wrinkles were removed easily. I would caution on using a traditional iron as it may discolor the shirt. This shirt fit is "regular" and found size medium to fit surprisingly well as I normally order a size large in COOFANDY shirts. I don't normally like to wear shirts that are fitted or slim as it makes me feel restricted when I move around. I like shirts that are just a tad bit loose and breathable. Overall, the COOFANDY Men's Casual Button Down Shirt is a great buy. It can be used year round and looks great in either shorts, jeans, or pants. The material is soft, stretchable, and breathable and feels lightweight when worn. The shirt does come with an extra shirt button just in case you loose a button and need to sew one right back in. A shirt pocket on the front is a plus and is perfect to store your sunglasses or any small items.Advantages:✅ Great Materials Used On Shirt✅ Soft, Lightweight, & Stretchable✅ Perfect Shirt For Casual OccasionsDisadvantages:⛔️ None

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great casual short sleeve button down that hides wrinkles
reviews.reviewText: Another great shirt from Coofandy. I have a lot of clothes from them now. I have been very impressed with the value and quality from them.This shirt is no exception. I love the color. It's like a periwinkle deep ocean blue. It fits exactly to size. I have an XL. The button stitching is nice and the material is light but also strong and thick. It's a nice blend of materials.I really like the texture to the shirt. It has a ripple in the material that hides wrinkles very well. This makes it a great shirt to travel with.It looks great with jeans or dressier pants like khakis. I highly recommend it and give it five stars. Get one in multiple colors. It's easy to wear and care for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my dad who is traveling back home where the weather is warmer so the material is perfect for those hot sunny days as it's thin. It's made of great material which is very comfortable, soft to touch and breathable. The size that we got for him was medium and it fits him perfectly. He loved it and even while he was wearing it it didn't wrinkle right away. The design is also great and one of the great things about this shirt is it has a mini pocket on the front. You can either wear it as it is or wear an undershirt and just leave it open. I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this shirt!
reviews.reviewText: I am a very big guy, so I had to order a size 2XL, and it fits very well. I love this style of shirt and have been wearing them for years, but for some reason, it's getting harder to find these kinds of shirts at regular stores, so I decided to try online, after all, if I don't like them, or they don't fit well, I can always exchange it. But that was not the case with this one! I really liked it the moment I opened the vacuum-sealed package it came in. After trying it on and seeing how well it fits, and the great quality of the fabric, I decided to order more in different colors. If you're a big (fat) guy, order the size you always buy for you, and it will fit just fine, it won't be tight or too short.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool, lightweight shirt
reviews.reviewText: This is a great summer shirt, excellent for warmer weather. It is fully synthetic. The sleeves are a bit short for my liking, but the fabric is attractive.The shirt is received vacuum-sealed and as a result was pretty wrinkled when opened, but I ran it through a wash cycle and it came out perfect.It is lightweight and flowing, and the fabric has an attractive texture.Who is this for?- Anyone who wants a cool, lightweight shirt for summer wearingPros:- Wrinkle-free (after washing)- LightweightCons:- Sleeves are a bit short

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another good shirt
reviews.reviewText: I really like this name brand. Whomever is designing and sizing the shirts does a very good job. I’m 5’10” 175lbs x I always order medium size shirts. This name brand is spot on in terms of size. And the style and cut is just right. And I love the fabric - they have a wide variety of fabric and textures. This particular shirt and the color blue is very nice. Highly recommended for us guys!My review rating guideline:⭐️1 star - Not recommended because of poor quality or bad design.⭐️⭐️ 2 stars - Multiple problems or it’s overpriced. Would not buy again.⭐️⭐️⭐️ 3 stars - Product is OK but it has some problems.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 4 stars - Product is good and description is accurate. Price is within reason.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 stars - Awesome. Would not hesitate to recommend. Price to value ratio is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute shirt & huddy says VERY comfy!!
reviews.reviewText: Love the material on this shirt! It's got a nice stretch to it, and the 'texture' is great too!! The color is more like they have pictured! Mine seems to make it look way darker than it really is! But, it's super cute! Hubby says it's SUPER comfy too! He's apx. 5'11" & 230lbs & this XXL worked perfectly!! Nicely made and VERY reasonably priced! Would recommend for sure!! A+!! Thanks much & hope this helps!
